```pddl
[
  (:action read_instructions
   :parameters (?ins - instructions ?p - person)
   :precondition (and (at ?ins ?p))
   :effect (and (read ?ins))
  )

  (:action read
   :parameters (?entity - person ?resource - resource)
   :precondition (and (at ?resource ?entity) (not (read ?resource)))
   :effect (read ?resource)
  )

  (:action wash
   :parameters (?item - clothing ?p - person ?wm - washing_machine)
   :precondition (and (at ?item ?p) (at ?wm ?p))
   :effect (clean ?item)
  )

  (:action check_boots
   :parameters (?b - boots ?p - person)
   :precondition (and (at ?b ?p) (is_synthetic ?b))
   :effect (and (checked ?b))
  )

  (:action check
   :parameters (?entity - object ?checker - person)
   :precondition (and (available ?checker) (at ?entity ?checker) (not (checked ?entity)) (condition ?entity))
   :effect (and (checked ?entity))
  )

  (:action clean
   :parameters (?person - person ?item - object)
   :precondition (and (at ?item ?person) (not (clean ?item)))
   :effect (clean ?item)
  )
]
```
